name: Poutinertots
author: sonjagroset
summary: Poutine made with Tater Tots® equals Poutinertots! The crispy tots hold up well to the gravy, plus the name is fun to say.
ingredients: 1 (32 ounce) package frozen bite-size potato nuggets (such as Tater Tots®)
1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Grease a baking sheet and spread potato nuggets onto sheet
Bake in the preheated oven, stirring halfway through cooking, until golden brown and crispy, 25 to 35 minutes
Whisk cold water and gravy mix together in a saucepan; place over medium heat and cook, stirring frequently, until gravy comes to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer for 1 minute
Place potato nuggets on a serving platter, sprinkle cheese curds over potato nuggets, and pour gravy over the top
